title: How can I remove that annoying consumables tab from my item sets?
body: Everyone of my sets have got a consumables tab with a control ward, ward upgrade, potions, and elixers. Yet they all also got a tab at the very bottom called "consumables" with just a control ward there? Please tell me how to get rid of this, and if not then please add a featuure to remove it.

replies.body: Pretty sure you just click the "x" in the upper right corner of that item block when editing the item set under Collections. That'll remove the entire block and the items inside it. Lemme know if that button isn't working for some reason!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=uNXsjmMy,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-12-11T01:53:49.910+0000)
>
> Pretty sure you just click the "x" in the upper right corner of that item block when editing the item set under Collections. That'll remove the entire block and the items inside it. Lemme know if that button isn't working for some reason!

I'm talking about [THIS](https://i.imgur.com/bF8bIQK.png) when using custom sets. you can see at the very bottom there is a control ward, and in item set editor tool thingy the block does not exist,

I did get more info about this! The devs seem to think this is related to the item set *above* the consumables not having a name applied? Try adjusting that for me really quick and let me know if that helps!

> I did get more info about this! The devs seem to think this is related to the item set *above* the consumables not having a name applied? Try adjusting that for me really quick and let me know if that helps!

Can you please elaborate further? In the screenshot you can see each item block is named (even those above the item sets in the image are all named), and there is my personal consumables block that is the exact same spelling as the one with the control ward.

Yea but it looks like that block above the control ward is named the exact same thing as the control ward block. Do me a favor and adjust those names, delete the ward block if it's in the item sets in Profile, and test it out. 

If that still isn't working, then I'd default back to the bug report as I mentioned at first. Thought we'd give this a shot as one of the devs mentioned this *should* fix it.

I renamed the black to "Tools" and it's still there. And no it's not in the item sets.

Also I reported it as a bug back then so thats already done.

Huh....strange. I just hopped in a match myself to test this and sure enough, those wards are still popping up for me as well. I'm not sure just yet if this is a bug related to this patch, or if the custom item sets have always done this. For now, I'd say to go ahead and treat this as a bug and report it through the Report a Bug board or through the client.
Experiencing the same issue since recently. I also include a consumables tab in my custom item sets, but there's always the "extra" one showing in game with just the control ward.
This has been happening to me as well. This started to happen to me when the preseason started.
Please riot remove the control ward thing its honestly so annoying

Ridicilous. I have the same problem and it was even more acute. I had done some item sets, one of which really included this Control ward item. 2-3 weeks ago I estimated that not only it was spamming in the item sets that I've created without the ward, but some sub-tables of mine included items from other item sets, sometimes appearing in all or almost all item sets that I have done(for example I have done a list of all Ornn items and all of them started to appear at all my item sets) I found out that if I delete all item sets ( ! :/ ) that contained the Ornn's items and the spamming potions, in some cases some item sets, created from Recommended with almost no my changes, such spams disappeared. But this Control Ward item NEVER disappears and I don't understand why. Pls, RIOT, it's confusing as i have to search my sets and I hit on a subsection with an item usually far not so useful in most my matches.

Same bug for me as of patch 8.4
In addition if I name a custom category "Situational" it always gets renamed to "Situational Items" ingame.
I also have this issue on the current patch.
Why is this still a thing?! patch 8.6, still happens... cmon... I am sure it's not that hard to fix it...
